text: The Nun's Story is a 1959 American drama movie directed by Fred Zinnemann and was based on the 1956 novel of the same name by Kathryn Hulme. It stars Audrey Hepburn, Peter Finch, Edith Evans, Peggy Ashcroft, Beatrice Straight, Dean Jagger, Ruth White, Patricia Bosworth, Colleen Dewhurst, Lionel Jeffries and was distributed by Warner Bros.. It was nominated for 8 Academy Awards in 1960. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1959 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Fred Zinnemann Category:Movies about nurses Category:Movies set in the 1920s Category:Movies set in the 1930s Category:Movies set in Belgium Category:Movies set in the Democratic Republic of the Congo
title: The Nun's Story (movie)
